title: Do computer glasses work for watching TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer glasses are usually made for a 26 to 30 inch focal distance. A TV is normally a lot farther than that so proper computer glasses should not work for that distance. Unless what you are calling “ computer glasses” are the scam glasses sold on line with no power in them that supposedly cure all kinds of problems but do nothing in reality. Real “ computer glasses” are based on your prescription from your regular glasses.

If the TV screen is the same distance from your eyes as the computer screen, yes, they work just the same. Also for reading a book that is the same distance from your eyes. Computer glasses do not know if you are using them to look at a computer screen.
